short_description: kachelofenbau peter achatz is an industrial air solutions company based in aiterhofen (vgem), germany.
long_description: ihr meisterbetrieb für kachelofenbau: peter achatz in oberpiebing bei salching. in uns finden sie den richtigen partner rund um kachelöfen, kaminöfen und herde. kompetenz und jahrelange erfahrung garantieren für qualität.
generated_description: kachelofen achatz is a company based in salching, bavaria, specializing in the construction and installation of stoves, fireplaces, and kitchen stoves. founded by peter achatz in 1999, the company offers comprehensive services from consultation and planning to the construction of new stoves and ongoing maintenance. achatz, who successfully passed the master examination in stove and ventilation heating in 1998, is known for his expertise in creating customized heating solutions, including pellet stoves and integration with modern water technology. the company emphasizes quality craftsmanship, reliable project execution, and post-project support.
